mapper.select:
select
from mp_agent_charge_record where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and del_flag = 1
mapper.update: update mp_agent_charge_record set del_flag = 0 where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

discount,

where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
